short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your Perfect Size every time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PerfectFit is a Chrome Extension that can turn the online shopping nightmare into a simple and enjoyable experience by finding your perfect fit every time. It currently works on Nordstrom, but stay tuned for updates!
